title: Zuckerberg Protecting Oligarchy, Pancakes vs Waffles 2.18.22
itunes:title: Zuckerberg Protecting Oligarchy, Pancakes vs Waffles 2.18.22
description:
In episode 1088, Miles and guest co-host Caitlin Durante are joined by comedian Valerie Tosi to discuss Oh no way, working at Tesla is a hellscape for Black workers…, Speaking of tech weirdness…YOU ARE NOW METAMATES, Olympics continues to infuriate…resources edition, Waffles vs Pancakes and more!

  1. Oh no way, working at Tesla is a hellscape for Black workers…
  2. Olympics continues to infuriate…resources edition
  3. Waffles vs Pancakes


The Bechdel Cast

Beach Trash by Valerie Tosi

LISTEN: Never Catch Me feat. Kendrick Lamar by Flying Lotus

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
